mapper.sql: id, tenant_id, operate_time, operate_by, operate_name, operate_log
mapper.select:
select
from sys_log where tenant_id = #{tenantId}
AND operate_by like CONCAT('%',#{loginUser},'%')
AND operate_name like CONCAT('%',#{userName},'%')
AND DATE_FORMAT(operate_time, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{beginDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(operate_time, '%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')
order by operate_time desc
mapper.insert:
insert into sys_log
id,
tenant_id,
operate_time,
operate_by,
operate_name,
operate_log,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{tenantId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{operateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{operateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{operateLog,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update sys_log
tenant_id = #{tenantId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
operate_time = #{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
operate_by = #{operateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operate_name = #{operateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operate_log = #{operateLog,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update sys_log set tenant_id = #{tenantId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, operate_time = #{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, operate_by = #{operateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operate_name = #{operateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operate_log = #{operateLog,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
